suspect_profile.name: Baron Zephyr
suspect_profile.secret: He stole the painting to claim insurance money.

crime.event: The Golden Phoenix painting was stolen last night.

evidence.description: Security camera footage shows a figure entering at 11:30 PM.
A glove belonging to Zephyr was found near the back exit.
Zephyr claims he was at a dinner party until midnight.
The dinner party host says Zephyr left early at 10:30 PM.
